meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fierce or savage.
meanings.sent2: The ferocity of the storm was frightening.
meanings.sent3: The kitten tried to mimic the ferocity of a tiger during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Her ferocity in defending her family was like a lioness protecting her cubs.
meanings.sent5: The ferocity of the dragon's roar echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent1: The battle was won through sheer ferocity.
meanings.sent2: His ferocity in the ring earned him the championship title.
meanings.sent3: The ferocity of the toddler's tantrum surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The ferocity of the wildfire consumed everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The ferocity of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
